org.jetel.graph.runtime

Interface CloverWorkerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJobflowComponent, Aggregate, AggregateOld, AproxMergeJoin, BulkLoader, CheckForeignKey, CloverDataReader, CloverDataWriter, Concatenate, DataGenerator, DataIntersection, DataReader, DataWriter, DB2DataWriter, DBExecute, DBFDataReader, DBFDataWriter, DBInputTable, DBJoin, DBOutputTable, Dedup, DelimitedDataReader, DelimitedDataWriter, Denormalizer, ExtDataGenerator, ExtFilter, ExtSort, ExtXmlWriter, Filter, FixLenDataReader, FixLenDataWriter, HadoopReader, HadoopWriter, HashJoin, HttpConnector, InfobrightDataWriter, InformixDataWriter, JavaExecute, JmsReader, JmsWriter, JsonExtract, KeyGenerator, LdapReader, LdapWriter, LookupJoin, LookupTableReaderWriter, Merge, MergeJoin, MsSqlDataWriter, MysqlDataWriter, Node, Normalizer, OracleDataWriter, Partition, PostgreSqlDataWriter, Reformat, Rollup, RunGraph, SequenceChecker, SimpleCopy, SimpleDataGenerator, SimpleGather, Sort, SortWithinGroups, SpeedLimiter, StructureWriter, SystemExecute, TextTableWriter, Trash, TreeReader, TreeWriter, XLSReader, XLSWriter, XMLExtract, XmlReader, XmlWriter, XmlXPathReader, XSLDataTransformer

    public interface CloverWorkerListener
    This interface describes a listener which listens to a CloverWorker and thus can react on worker finishing, either gracefully or abnormally

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CloverWorkerListener.Event
      An event class carries all information needed when an CloverWorker talks to its listeners

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void workerCrashed(CloverWorkerListener.Event e)
      Called when a worker finishes abruptly - usually with a runtime Exception
      void workerFinished(CloverWorkerListener.Event e)
      Called when a worker finishes its job normally

    • Method Detail

        Called when a worker finishes its job normally
        Parameters:
